name: Five Nights at GD Twitter 2
description:
DISCLAIMER FOR ANDROID USERS: This game might not perform well on some older low-end Android devices.

The sequel to the FNaF parody based around the GD Twitter community.

CREDITS

Credits coming when the full version is out :P

Made by Pointify. All images, artwork and sounds used in this game belong to their respective owners.

This game is not affiliated with Geometry Dash, RobTop Games, and/or Five Nights at Freddy's. (duh)

Five Nights at Freddy's belongs to Scott Cawthon.
